channel.title: Dream Year
channel.description: This is a private feed for members of the Dream Year 2024 program with Kate Decker
channel.itunes:summary: This is a private feed for members of the Dream Year 2024 program with Kate Decker
channel.itunes:subtitle: This is a private feed for members of the Dream Year 2024 program with Kate Decker
channel.itunes:author: Kate Decker

item.title: START here + WELCOME
item.description:
Hello gorgeous!! HAPPY NEW YEAR!! 🦄

I am so excited to start 2024 together inside of Dream Year!
This is the year to blow your mind!

We are starting on January 11th.
Our Telegram chat will open that morning (I will send an opening message that day + the content for day 1!) but I suggest you click to join the chat now so that you don't miss anything!

JOIN HERE

I will see you soon!

Xo,
Kate Decker

item.title: DAY 1 - Stacking the GOLD
item.description:
Today is our stacking the gold day 🏅

What was GOOD this year?
Go back through your photos and see what was amazing, what worked, what delighted you, what surprised you in a good way.

Examples: I launched a new IG, I took the trip, I made a cake…

What is worth celebrating? Big or small.

What worked? What was serving me? What helped me become a better me?
Example: everything adds up little by little; measuring progress is a must to see progress.

🌟 BONUS: create a folder in your phone with your favorite pics representing this oast year.

What are the 5 pieces of wisdom you want to keep from last year?
Example: meditating every day makes me feel amazing; filling up my Stanley cup before I go to sleep helps me stay hydrated, when I measure my progress I grow; when I put blinders on I grow/succeed faster; setting out my gym clothes the night before helps me stick with my gym routine...

📣 Share 5 biggest lessons from 2023 with us in our Telegram chat! 💬

item.title: DAY 2 - Shoveling the Sh*t 💩
item.description:
Let's continue building that solid foundation. Take a matter a fact approach and let's inspect…👇

What didn't work? Aka what are the lessons you don't want to repeat? What led you to not hitting your goals...what were the things that you were doing/thinking that led you to NOT hit the goals you had?

Example: when I drink alcohol, I don't feel my best; when I don't meditate in the morning much mind is all over the place for the rest of the day; people pleasing and not giving myself what I need; not doing any self care 💆; giving my energy to people that never give back to me; beating myself up for everything...

📣 Share the 5 biggest lessons from this part with us inside of our Telegram chat 💬

IF some emotions come up, LET THEM, lean into them, feel them...(we will process them later too!)

🌟 BONUS audio: “this shouldn't have happened”

🌟 EXERCISE: grab a toilet paper + pen and write your little heart out in a forgiveness letter UNTIL you feel a release, after you are done, go pee on it and flush it! 🧻 (do NOT wipe with it!)

🌟 Alternative: write it on paper and burn it (safely!) or rip it apart!

After all of this, look back at the lessons you extracted from this part and check in how you feel, are there any emotions still coming up? If so, repeat one of these processes to release more!

item.title: DAY 2 BONUS - Clearing Guilt, Shame and Disappointment
item.description:
Make sure you count out loud (not just in your mind) from 1 to 10, 2 to 10, 3 to 10...WHILE you are listening to the audio script. You will NOT know consciously what I'm saying but your subconscious mind is ALWAYS listening, and in this case also re-programming.

At the end make sure to take a deep breath and think the word “release” as you exhale. Repeat this breath twice.

If you feel any emotions lingering, repeat the whole exercise one more time.
